title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, April 14, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss describes the members of General Jackson's staff to his wife, and relates some news about the Confederate draft, the militia, and a prisoner from New York.
keywords: Home Front, Death/Casualties, Prisons/Prisoners, Family, Military Authority, Church/Religious Activity, Medicine/Hospitals, Slavery, African Americans, Women, National Government, Patriotism, American Civil War
